name: Redacted Timeframe (John Widdoss)
description:
Features yet to come:

Password Generator and Hint system to follow.  This is supposed to be the main mechanic of the game where it's a race against the clock to solve it.  Another thing yet to implement was different puzzle mechanics besides password cracking.  There was going to be a card puzzle, a decryption puzzle, and even some minigames.  Sorry if this game is unfinished, I just ran out of time.  If there is any interest in the project I'll continue to pursue this further and update the game.

You are an employee of an elite hacker organization known as Miscellaneous Ransoming Hackers United Group Syndicate.  You are the one who has to decrypt the files and send any/all information that you can extract from the files.  However, once you get into the payload file, your activity will be detected within a certain time frame.  As a precaution, there is a permanent wipe function set inside the file, once it's opened you only have that much time to get the info out.  How much can you do before the game deletes itself??
